name: All that lies below
description: A narratively loaded pixel art sandbox mining adventure about the meaning of work and how people lie to themselves about it.

name: Spiel das HKW
description: For the Haus der Kulturen der Welt, in addition to a card game, three other prototypes were created, one of which became a full-fledged game.

name: X5 FRAMEWORK
description: The successful 2D browser MMO from Super Crowd. Stable core, expanded for each new release. Indie Arena Booth Online, Hamburg Games Conference, MAG Online and many more.

name: BUCKET OF BOLTS
description: A single-player journaling RPG in which you experience the eventful history of a legendary spaceship. Based on the Millennium Falcon from Star Wars.

name: KONTERBUNT
description: A serious game app that teaches kids & teens how to respond to prejudice in everyday life.

name: CORONA WORLD
description: Satirical Corona Jump 'n' Run in Super Mario look & with cool boss fight. Published by Browser Ballet as part of their online format.

name: MEMORY MACHINE
description: An exploratory puzzle prototype in which players are guided through the events and consequences of the Holocaust.

name: Brutus
description: A top down rogue like with Warhammer 40k vibes in a cool reimagined pixel art look.
